column4: Hi guys. I downloaded a big file 1go move it into /media/Data wich is a share partition with windows then went on windows put didn't see my file, neither when I come back in unbuntu :( where can I found it ? I've check lost+found already
no ActionParsnip it's an NTFS partition mounted at session start /etc/fstab
it may still be on that share location, but the samba share no longer mounted
oh on the same drive you mean?
